definition.de: Orden, Auszeichnungen und Preise inklusive der, die durch die Regierung vergeben werden.
definition.dk: Ære og belønning for en eller anden præstation, herunder dem, der tildeles af staten.
definition.en-GB: The recognition of an achievement in a field in the form of a symbolic item, such as a plaque or trophy or in the form of a monetary gift, such as a cash prize or grant, given by a government or private institution
definition.en-US: The recognition of an achievement in a field in the form of a symbolic item, such as a plaque or trophy or in the form of a monetary gift, such as a cash prize or grant, given by a government or private institution
definition.pt-BR: Condecorações, prêmios e recompensas, incluindo os que são atribuídos pelo governo.
definition.pt-PT: Condecorações, prémios e recompensas, incluindo os que são atribuídos pelo governo.
definition.se: Hedersbetygelser och belöning för viss prestation, inklusive sådana utdelade av staten.
definition.zh-Hans: 包括政府颁发的勋章、奖状、奖品、奖金
